articles.title: 80 smallcaps gain between 10-64% as market hits fresh high - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Going forward, the market remains a buy on dips as long as 23000 is not broken. On the higher end, the index might move towards 23500-23600, says Rupak De, Senior Technical Analyst, LKP Securities.
